details.description: Search English schools by type and location for an overview of the school, its performance scores and local council with links to schools data for Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland
details.alternative_title: Search for a school in England
details.more_information:
The database includes the following school types:

  • primary
  • secondary
  • special needs
  • state
  • private

You can search by:

  • location
  • name
  • local council
  • age range
  • gender
  • facilities, eg nursery provision, special needs provision
  • specialisms, eg sports, technology
  • state or private funded

Search results give:

  • an overview of the school
  • performance scores
  • map and directions
  • local council details

You can save and compare your search results and the system will store your favourites for up to 90 days.

Find out more about school admissions and when and how to apply for a place for your child.

Schools in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland

You can search for schools in other parts of the UK using:

  • Scottish Schools Online
  • Schools in Wales
  • Schools Database Northern Ireland
details.introduction: Search the official database for primary, secondary and special needs schools near you or anywhere in England. You can also access Ofsted reports and get information on school performance.

tags.title: School admissions and transport to school
